places.description: Campground near Mammoth Mountain in the Sierra Nevada Mountain range in central California.

restaurants.description: Chinese Hunanese restauraunt. Basically the super spicy Chinese food. Excellent.
El Salvadoran restaurant specialized in Papusas. Located on Mission street in San Fran. Best Papusas I have ever had.

cities.description: One of the most interesting places to visit. All food in San Francisco is to die for. I have family there and it is where my grandmother landed when she emigrated from El Salvador.
